name: Change tuition (<=)
terms: "Reduce tuition”, "freeze tuition”, "differ tuition”, "decrease tuition”, "lower tuition”, "discount tuition”, "offer tuition discount”

name: Reduce Hiring
terms: "deferred hiring” "deferred hiring of vacant positions”, "Hiring freeze”

name: Salary increase and promotion freeze
terms: "Freeze salary increases”, "no salary changes”, "no merit increases”

name: Voluntary and/or incentivized staff and faculty reduction
terms: "Offer retirement incentives”, "voluntary pay cuts”, "voluntary furlough”, "voluntary leave”, "voluntary salary reduction”, "voluntary pay reduction”
